name: mod
description: Moderate your server with these utility commands

options.name: log
options.description: Configure moderation command usage logging for this server

options.name: set
options.description: Set a channel for logging moderation command usage in this server

options.name: channel
options.description: The text channel you want moderation command usage to be logged in, default current channel

options.name: show
options.description: Show the configuration of moderation command usage logging in this server

options.name: spam
options.description: Configure spam channels for this server

options.name: add
options.description: Set a channel where users' messages/words will not be counted

options.name: channel
options.description: The text channel you want users' messages/words to not be counted in, default current channel

options.name: remove
options.description: Revert to counting users' messages/words in channel

options.name: channel
options.description: The text channel you want users' messages/words to be counted in, default current channel
